Member.name: GetParkings
Member.summary: Returns all commuter parking areas with parking lots and stop areas.

Member.name: GetParking
Member.summary: Returns all commuter parking areas with parking lots and stop areas.
Member.param: Id of parking area or a parking lot

Member.name: GetHistoricalAvailability
Member.summary: Returns the number of historical free spaces for one commuter parking area or one parking lot between the specified date.
Member.param: Id of parking area or a parking lot
Member.returns: If record of free spaces exists they will be returned

Member.name: GetAvailableCapacity
Member.summary: Returns availible capacity for one commuter parking area or one parking lot.
Member.param: Id of parking area or a parking lot

Member.name: GetParkingImage
Member.summary: Returns the latest captured image (GIF) for the specified camera on the specified parking lot.
Member.param: Id of parking area or a parking lot
Cameras are numbered from 1 and up within each parking lot
